name: The Radicle Project
description:
Congratulations!  You have been chosen to participate in the Radicle Project!  All I ask is that you solve a few mazes for me.  Not everybody will be able to survive this ordeal: it will be up to you who survives and who is left to die.  However, death is not necessarily permanent, and you will soon learn how to change the past.  I look forward to your performace.

- Cipher

Controls:

Chat:

Press any key that is not bound to another control to advance the text

Maze:

WASD - Move

Q/E - Toggle character

R - Restart maze

Left click on colored lock - Opens all locks of that color (once you have gained that ability)

root.exe:

Click on colored circle - Travel to that event

(Note: the exclamation points mark the event that you can currently change)

Other:

Ctrl+F - Toggle fullscreen

Esc - Return to the main menu

M - Open root.exe (once you have gained that ability)

Music Credits:

Menu Music: "BGM Action 2" by RevampedPRO

Game Music: "High Tech Lab" by remaxim 

Endings Music: "Space Dimensions" by Matthew Pablo

This game was made for Extra Credits Game Jam #5

The theme was "Passage" (which is reflected in the maze elements and limitations on which characters can pass onward)
